mets:mets.LABEL: University of Muenster, Institutional Repository MIAMI

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: EUNIS 2017 – Shaping the Digital Future of Universities
mods:titleInfo.mods:subTitle: Book of Proceedings, EUNIS 23rd Annual Congress

mods:name.mods:namePart: Westfalen / Universität Münster / Zentrum für Informationsverarbeitung
Landesbibliothek Münster / Universitäts- und Landesbibliothek Münster

mods:mods.mods:abstract: EUNIS, the European University Information Systems Organization, aims to contribute to the development of high quality information systems in Europe’s Higher Education. For those responsible for information technology at universities or research organisations, the yearly congress is a perfect opportunity to establish relationships, exchange experiences and discuss contemporary issues.
